bill.title: The role of the clerk of a circuit court in filing the oath and bond of a municipal judge; signatures on citations or complaints alleging a violation of a municipal ordinance; the fee for a transcript of an electronic recording of municipal court proceedings; and the authority of a municipal court judge to order a default judgment against a defendant who fails to appear at trial (suggested as remedial legislation by the Law Revision Committee).
bill.description: An Act to repeal 19.01 (4) (c) 3. and 59.40 (2) (L); to amend 19.01 (4) (c) 4., 800.02 (2) (a), 814.08 (1) and 814.65 (5); and to create 800.08 (5) of the statutes; relating to: the role of the clerk of a circuit court in filing the oath and bond of a municipal judge; signatures on citations or complaints alleging a violation of a municipal ordinance; the fee for a transcript of an electronic recording of municipal court proceedings; and the authority of a municipal court judge to order a default judgment against a defendant who fails to appear at trial (suggested as remedial legislation by the Law Revision Committee).

referrals.name: Judiciary, Utilities, Commerce, and Government Operations

history.action: Read first time and referred to committee on Judiciary, Utilities, Commerce, and Government Operations
Failed to pass pursuant to Senate Joint Resolution 1
